database.name: VIEW IDLEBP_BPLIST_V
database.view: SELECT concat("left"(bp.c_bpartner_id, 9), COALESCE("left"(pc.synpreg_bp_prodcyc_id, 9), ''), COALESCE("left"(sb.c_bp_bankaccount_id, 9), '')) AS idlebp_bplist_v_id, bp.ad_client_id, bp.ad_org_id, bp.isactive, bp.created, bp.createdby, bp.updated, bp.updatedby, bp.c_bpartner_id, sb.c_bp_bankaccount_id, pr.synpreg_producer_reg_id, pc.c_project_id, ta.user1_id, std.synpreg_timb_data_id, pc.synpreg_bp_prodcyc_id FROM c_bpartner bp LEFT JOIN c_bp_bankaccount sb ON bp.c_bpartner_id = sb.c_bpartner_id AND sb.em_synpreg_isdefault = 'Y' LEFT JOIN synpreg_producer_reg pr ON pr.c_bpartner_id = bp.c_bpartner_id LEFT JOIN synpreg_bp_prodcyc pc ON pc.c_bpartner_id = bp.c_bpartner_id LEFT JOIN synint_bp_tradacc ta ON ta.c_bpartner_id = bp.c_bpartner_id LEFT JOIN synpreg_timb_data std ON bp.c_bpartner_id = std.c_bpartner_id WHERE bp.em_synpreg_isprod = 'Y'
